column4: are there a group of files that gnome keeps things like panel configuration? I'm trying to figure out an easy way of transfering the gnome setup I have on one box to other boxen so I can enjoy the same layout with out having to configure it on every single box i sit down at.
My other question is why is the ubuntu wiki using https instead of http?
specifically, you want the .gnome, .gnome2 etc directories
